text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook You can't focus on the agony and anger of black American's protesting outside of the White House, the Coronavirus and your vetoing the Vet bill, just Twitter and spreading your hate, racism and conspiracy theories. Rep's, Ind's and Dem's are Voting for Joe, so you can go!
